price: 66. Entonces no podrán pensar en ninguna respuesta (como excusa) ni se preguntarán entre ellos (para saber cómo contestar).
arabic: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faʿamiyat ʿalayhimu al-anbāu yawma-idhin fahum lā yatasāalūna
